Message.Title: The accelerating decline of America
Message.Msg: It's just sickening how quickly this country is deteriorating and the middle class and poor will BE BURNED the most. Obama has turned the government into pretty much a thugocracy already. I once lived in a 3rd world country while in the service and saw what people actually had to do for survival when their currency lost 80% of its value every year. Obama is leading America to be a third world country and once it's there, it's stuck in a whirlpool. I put my assets away from the US currency system such as hard assets or foreign investments. As the economic collapse worsens and breaks down, I will have food and assets to trade for what I need to live for a lifestyle above what most people will have because I have already prepared for it. I also have guns and armed neighbors to protect oury property from liberal trespassers trying to help themselves to what they didn't earn. During Bush administration, I created and maintained 9 positions; 7 drivers and 2 on support staff. After Obama’s additional regulations and taxes I had to layoff some good people and now I’m down to 3. If Obama continues trying to make my business more unprofitable, I will sell out and retire with 3 more people out of jobs. -Sincerely Yours "Fishnman"

Message.Title: Yahoo bans employees from working at home
Message.Msg: Yahoo CEO Marissa Mayer has some employees up in arms after she put the kibosh on working remotely from home and is now calling all Yahoo staff to report to the office. The move will only impact a small percentage of the company's workforce, primarily customer service representatives or staffers who work in city's where Yahoo does not have an office. But the internal announcement on Friday has ruffled feathers as many employees say the flexible work arrangement is a key part of their job and will have a significant impact on their personal lives. (the libs cry wah!!!! ) Fishnman's opinion ....Looking at the Dailymail picture of Yahoo staff meeting, they look like a bunch of clueless college kid brats except for Ms. Mayer who is just clueless. Picture at bottom of dailymail article shows the big Yahoo headquarters building. So is that where you spent the money which should have been paid as dividends?! Your product is an internet website and really you don't produce anything. Yahoo overhead comes at an astronomical cost. I would expect your building be 5% of that size at most.

Message.Title: New Yahoo Homepage
Message.Msg: The new homepage is just horrible. There's no scrolling to the bottom and no way to call the company and speak to anyone. I wouldn't buy this stock on a bet. The stock was once $200 a share and it is now 1/10 that without a split. They have been through CEO's aplenty and this is the best they can come up with. Even more, the sports homepages are backloaded with so much graphics that the pages bounce around. I don't understand who makes these decisions, but they need to find other work.
